author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-4030: getOrdTermsEnum no longer returns null when no terms were uninverted (SOLR-3427)

author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Add key-encrypting-key support; this is to bring ofbiz *much*
closer to PCI compliance.  This key handler is *still* not active.

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE: Move delegatorInfo assignment into the constructor; in all
cases, this will always be configured, so might as well do it early.
This really should be final, but that change will come later.

author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Add SaltedBase64StorageHandler to EntityCrypto; key names are
base-64 crypted({hashType}$text), key values are base64 encoded,
encrypted row values are $salt$encoded.  Note, however, that this code
is not yet active, as it hasn't been added to the list of key handlers.
This new handler is *not* active yet.

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE/FEATURE: Move a bunch of code around, into a set of abstract
classes and concrete instances.  This allows for adding new types of key
management blocks, so that enhanced features can be added.  No
functional changes have actually been implemented yet; all existing
